## EventRouter.emit() method

Emit an event, invoking all registered listeners for the event type.

**Signature:**

```typescript
emit<TPayload>(eventType: string, payload: TPayload): boolean;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

eventType


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

The type of event to emit.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

payload


</td><td>

TPayload


</td><td>

The payload to emit.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

boolean

`true` if listeners were found and invoked, `false` otherwise.
